name: MediaSettings
desc: Constraints on the media content the user can access.

items.name: var maximumMovieRating: Int?
items.desc: The maximum movie rating the user may view.

items.name: var maximumTVShowRating: Int?
items.desc: The maximum TV show rating that the user may view.

items.name: static let maximumMovieRating: BoundedSettingMetadata<Int>
items.desc: The metadata for the setting that controls the maximum movie rating.

items.name: static let maximumTVShowRating: BoundedSettingMetadata<Int>
items.desc: The metadata for the setting that controls the maximum TV show rating.

items.name: var denyExplicitContent: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from accessing explicit content.

items.name: static let denyExplicitContent: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata for the setting that denies explicit content.

items.name: var denyMusicService: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from accessing Apple Musicâ€™s streaming content.

items.name: static let denyMusicService: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with denying access to Apple Music.

items.name: var denyBookstoreErotica: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to deny media categorized as erotica in the Books store.

items.name: static let denyBookstoreErotica: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the setting that denies access to content in the Books store categorized as erotica.
